Title: Tytuł
ReadEventNotFound: Nie znaleziono wydarzenia. Upewnij się, że jest prawidłowe.
ServerConnectionError: Błąd połączenia z serwerem, Serwer jest nie dostępny, proszę spróbować ponownie.
EventNameEmpty: Nazwa wydarzenia jest pusta, proszę dodać nazwę
InvitationCodeForm: Kod zaproszenia powinien być w formie: XXXXXXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXXXXXXXXXX (w formacie UUID)
ServerErrorAlert: Nastąpił błąd podczas łączenia się z serwerem
FileSaveErrorAlert: Nastąpił błąd podczas zapisywania kodu zaproszenia na dysku
ExpensePaidByEmpty: Paid By field is empty, please choose a participant.  (to be translated...)
ExpenseTitleEmpty: Expense title field is empty, please add a title. (to be translated...)
ExpenseAmountEmpty: Expense amount field is empty, please fill in an amount.
ExpenseAmountWrongFormatEmpty: Expense amount field is not a number or is negative or equal to zero, please fill in a positive number. (don't use commas, use periods instead) (to be translated...)
ParticipantFirstNameEmpty: First name field is empty, please fill in a first name. (to be translated...)
ParticipantLastNameEmpty: Last name field is empty, please fill in a last name. (to be translated...)
ConfirmationAddingExpense: Are you sure you want to add this expense? (to be translated...)
ConfirmationEditExpense: Are you sure you want to edit this expense? (to be translated...)
ConfirmationDeleteExpense: Are you sure you want to delete this expense? (to be translated...)
ConfirmationCreateParticipant: Are you sure you want to add this participant? (to be translated...)
ConfirmationEditParticipant: Are you sure you want to edit this participant? (to be translated...)
ConfirmationDeleteParticipant: Are you sure you want to delete this participant? (to be translated...)
ConfirmationDeleteEvent: Are you sure you want to delete this event? (to be translated...)
SuccessfullyJsonDump: Successfully saved JSON file to chosen backup directory. (to be translated...)
ServerIPEmpty: doesn't exist. Created new default file, please put the server url if it isn't localhost:8080 in client-config.json. You need to delete localhost:8080 and put it there. (to be translated...)
ServerIPWrongFormat: is the wrong format. Created new default file, please put the server url if it isn't localhost:8080 in client-config.json. You need to delete localhost:8080 and put it there. (to be translated...)
LanguageEmpty: doesn't exist. Created new default file, please put the language if it isn't en(english) in client-config.json. + You need to delete en and put it there. (to be translated...)
LanguageWrongFormat: is the wrong format. Created new default file, please put the language if it isn't en(english) in client-config.json. + You need to delete en and put it there. (to be translated...)
